title: Awesome List Updates on Jul 12, 2020
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Jul 12, 2020 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Django
items.content_text:
### Third-Party Packages / Testing

*   [django-google-optimize (⭐41)](https://github.com/adinhodovic/django-google-optimize) - Django application designed to make running server side Google Optimize A/B tests easy.
items.content_html:
Third-Party Packages / Testing

  • django-google-optimize (⭐41) - Django application designed to make running server side Google Optimize A/B tests easy.

items.title: Awesome Discord Communities
items.content_text:

items.title: Awesome Robotic Tooling
items.content_text:
### Simulation / Version Control

*   [simbody (⭐2.4k)](https://github.com/simbody/simbody) - High-performance C++ multibody dynamics/physics library for simulating articulated biomechanical and mechanical systems like vehicles, robots, and the human skeleton.
items.content_html:
Simulation / Version Control

  • simbody (⭐2.4k) - High-performance C++ multibody dynamics/physics library for simulating articulated biomechanical and mechanical systems like vehicles, robots, and the human skeleton.

items.title: Awesome Eslint
items.content_text:
### Plugins / Practices and Specific ES Features

*   [RegExp (⭐727)](https://github.com/ota-meshi/eslint-plugin-regexp) - ESLint plugin for finding regexp mistakes and style guide violations.
items.content_html:
Plugins / Practices and Specific ES Features

  • RegExp (⭐727) - ESLint plugin for finding regexp mistakes and style guide violations.
